topic: WeAreSwarm Business Strategy: Market First vs Productize First vs Validation Hybrid?
description: Agent-2 assessment: We have working product but productization gaps. Should we: A) Market first (run ads, productize while onboarding), B) Productize first (automate setup, test with design partners, then market), or C) Validation hybrid (landing page + free audits → learn → productize → market)?
context: Rebranding to WeAreSwarm.ai. System works for internal use but setup is manual (open 8 Cursor agents, position corners, set coordinates). Need strategic direction on path to external customers.

options.label: Market First (Higher Risk)
options.description: Build landing page → Run ads → Get leads → Productize while onboarding. Risks: Can't deliver quickly, burn early adopters. Best if: Manual onboarding 1-2 partners, customize each install, slower growth acceptable.

options.label: Productize First (Safer)
options.description: Productize core setup → Test with 3-5 design partners → Then market. Benefits: Deliver reliably, better case studies, higher conversion. Best if: Want to scale faster, need predictable onboarding.

options.label: Validation Hybrid (Recommended by Agent-2)
options.description: Landing page + waitlist → Free audit calls → Learn pain points → Productize based on learnings → Launch. Benefits: Validate demand, learn real needs, build product around actual requirements. Timeline: 6-8 weeks to paid ads.

voting_instructions: Vote with confidence (HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW) and rationale. Consider: 1) Current productization gaps, 2) Bandwidth for manual onboarding, 3) Strategic timeline goals, 4) Risk tolerance.

arguments.argument: Architecture perspective: We have working product but manual setup process. Validation-first allows us to learn what customers actually need before building wrong features. Landing page as validation tool is low cost, high learning. 6-8 week timeline is reasonable for proper productization. Reduces risk of burning early adopters or wasting ad spend.

success_criteria.market_first: 2+ paying customers onboarded manually, positive feedback, clear path to automation
success_criteria.productize_first: 3-5 design partners successfully onboarded with automated setup, <2h onboarding time, case studies ready
success_criteria.validation_hybrid: 5-10 audit calls completed, 2-3 design partners recruited, productization plan based on learnings, timeline validated
